所有表单控件的联合类型

format

format: ((item: any) => any)

Type declaration

    • (item: any): any

    • select、radio、checkbox 选项格式化函数（对应element-plus组件插槽）

      Parameters

      • item: any

      Returns any

inlayRuleType

inlayRuleType: { message?: string; trigger?: string; validatorName: keyof rulesIn }

Type declaration

  • Optional message?: string
  • Optional trigger?: string
  • validatorName: keyof rulesIn

optionsType

optionsType: { children?: any[] }[] | { key: string; type: "dic" } | { type: "api"; getData: any }

options选项 select、radio、checkbox、cascader（可能包含children）选项接口

Type declaration

  • Optional endValue?: any
  • Optional options?: optionsType
  • Optional value?: any
